headers.subject: [indiana-discuss] new ISO soon?
headers.x-spam-status: No, score=-2.0 required=5.0 tests=BAYES_00,MISSING_HEADERS, NO_RECEIVED,NO_RELAYS autolearn=disabled version=3.2.4

body.para: On 10/07/2008, at 5:36 AM, Ken Mays wrote:

quote.quotepara: So anyhow, I'd like to see an updated Live CD snapshot for Aug 2008 of OpenSolaris 2008.x with the newer GNOME 2.22.x release and latest ON build 93/94.

body.para: There will be in effect 2 ISOs being produced. The re-spin of 2008.05 (planned for August) will essentially fix some of the packaging bugs various people have experienced, along with a few minor tweaks. On the other side, a set of development ISOs will start to be produced that track the 'unstable' line working towards a final release of 2008.11 in November.
